item.title: Compilation
item.author: reid@reactific.com (Reid Spencer)
item.description: Introduction The Riddl compiler performs several analyses which are described in this section and known collectively as compilation. Each of these analyses occurs in a compilation phase, as described in the following sections. Lexical Analysis Riddl uses the excellent fastparse library by Li Haoyi. This phase parses the raw textual input to make sure it is syntactically correct. From that syntax, an abstract syntax tree (AST) is produced.
